title: Tom & Jack : A Frontier Story
description: A veteran drover and cattleman, Tom Kilfoyle partnered his kinsmen the Duracks in exploring and overlanding to the Kimberleys. His son Jack was an enterprising and mischievous man, the defendant in charges ranging from cattle duffing to breach of promise of marriage, and is remembered for his enlightened attitudes towards land management and Aboriginal stockmen.A great real-life adventure and enthralling family saga, Tom and Jack is one of the rare success stories of the early days of the Kimberley cattle industry. The author, a granddaughter of one of the original overlanders, had meticulously researched this fascinating history.
author: Geraldine Byrne
